name: LD46: Keep it alive
description:
Ludum Dare 46 game.

Take care of the animals. They are hungry.

Controls: Arrows

Pickup/Action: Down

The item number of your backpack has an impact on jump height. 

Empty backpack = high jump

Full backpack = small jump

The animals eat different food:

Rabbit eats carrot and apple.

Golem eats stone and gold.

The last animal eats gold.

Art, design: David Peter

Programming: Daniel Biro, Balazs Lengyeltoti

Music:

Debussy - Clair de Lune

Music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0_RnlOWmZD4

Rate it on Ludum Dare:

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/ld46-keep-it-alive-1
